what: Sample complete groups from a data frame — slice_block
title: Sample complete groups from a data frame — slice_block
text: Samples complete groups grouped data frame, including group part sample. Can considered form grouped bootstrap sampling.

title: Sample complete groups from a data frame — slice_block
code: slice_block(.data, ...)  # S3 method for class 'data.frame' slice_block(.data, ...)  # S3 method for class 'grouped_df' slice_block(.data, n = 1, replace = FALSE, weight_by = NULL, ...)

title: Sample complete groups from a data frame — slice_block
